Raddish Architecture

18 Nov 2014

A NodeJS architecture to use in projects.

Raddish is an architecture used for projects willing to serve multiple clients with a single backend. Being an API-first architecture this system allows you to connect mobile, tablet and desktop applications on a single access point.

If you would like to know more about Raddish you can visit: http://getraddish.com.
